sentence.Network_en: Teachers often view youth workers as undisciplined and ineffectual.
sentence.Network_cn: 老师们常认为青少年工作者纪律性差且能力低下。

sentence.Network_en: We live in an undisciplined world.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们生活在一个杂乱无章的世界.

sentence.Network_en: He had never been truly irresponsible; but he had been undisciplined, selfish, and ruthless.
sentence.Network_cn: 他从来就有真诚的责任感, 但他又很不安分, 自私, 无情.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 散字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 散乱〖 messy〗 散漫〖 undisciplined〗 散曲〖 atypeofverse〗.
英文性格描述词汇 - Apple的日志 - 网易博客 ... 散漫的 lax 混乱无纪律的 undisciplined 粗心的 careless.
undischarged 未排出的undisciplined 无训练的undiscovered 未被发觉的
放_百度百科 ... 放恣〖 indulge〗 放纵〖 self-indulgent；undisciplined〗 放走〖 letgo；letsb.getoff；makesb.free；letout〗.

list.abs: undisciplined people , driven by their personal antipathies and sympathies , are forever on the lookout for signs that build up or reinforce their unexamined views and opinions .没有修养的人被他们个人的好恶所驱使，他们永远都在巡视是不是有什么讯息可以建构或强化他们未经检视的看法与见解。
The event was ruined by a screaming undisciplined child ., 这个场合被一位尖叫没有规矩的孩子破坏了.
undisciplined behavior ; ungoverned youth ., 散漫的行为 ; 放纵的年轻人.
We live in an undisciplined world ., 我们生活在一个杂乱无章的世界.

entry.def: If you describe someone as undisciplined, you mean that they behave badly or in a disorganized way.

example.ex: ...a noisy and undisciplined group of students...
example.tran: 一群吵吵嚷嚷、乱哄哄的学生

example.ex: Teachers often view youth workers as undisciplined and ineffectual.
example.tran: 老师们常认为青少年工作者纪律性差且能力低下。

means.word_mean: 2. not subjected to correction or discipline;

auth_sentence.content: That's a major distraction to undisciplined minds.
auth_sentence.res_content: That's a major distraction to undisciplined minds.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: That's a major distraction to undisciplined minds.

auth_sentence.content: You observe that undisciplined students tend to have undisciplined parents.
auth_sentence.res_content: You observe that undisciplined students tend to have undisciplined parents.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: You observe that undisciplined students tend to have undisciplined parents.

auth_sentence.content: Not all criminals are stupid or undisciplined.
auth_sentence.res_content: Not all criminals are stupid or undisciplined.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Not all criminals are stupid or undisciplined.
